about_the_game:
Mighty Swordsman is a 2D platformer that throws you into the epicenter of the battle with countless hordes of enemies. You are an unknown warrior, inspired only by the thirst for peace and quiet. The enemy hordes, like a black plague, devour the world, leaving behind destruction and despair. And it is you who are destined to become the last hope for civilians, the only force capable of stopping this bloody storm.

In your arsenal - only loyalty to your duty, a sharp sword and boundless determination. You are not interested in rewards, do not beckon treasures. Your goal is simple - to stop the chaos, protect the innocent, and, perhaps, find the peace that you so crave.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You need to destroy enemies on the location and complete the tasks.

He fights not for glory, not for wealth, but for peace.
